channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Grok et deepfakes : pour la France, la stratégie d’Elon Musk est « complètement hypocrite »
item.description: L'ambassadrice de la France pour l'intelligence artificielle, Clara Chappaz, ne décolère pas. Rendre payante la génération d'images sur Grok après le scandale des deepfakes est une réponse « cynique » qui permet à X de monétiser les abus.

item.title: New ruling in Rockstar Games legal battle means the GTA 6 studio won't be forced to pay fired employees interim relief — 'We regret that we were put in a position where dismissals were necessary'
item.description: A judge has officially ruled that Rockstar Games won't be forced to pay interim relief to the 34 Grand Theft Auto 6 developers it fired in October, after the IWGB accused the studio of union-busting.

item.title: WhatsApp planche sur un système de contrôle parental
item.description: Les équipes de Meta veulent aider les parents à protéger au mieux les échanges de leurs enfants.

item.title: PC shipments just grew unexpectedly amid RAM shortages
item.description: The PC market is bracing for a turbulent year ahead, but shipments managed to exceed expectations in the recent holiday quarter. IDC reports that shipments grew nearly 10 percent year-over-year in the fourth quarter of 2025, reaching 76.4 million in total. Microsoft's end of Windows 10 support undoubtedly helped push PC shipments up, but IDC […]

item.title: Superorganism raises $25M to back biodiversity startups
item.description: Superorganism launched in 2023 as what it claims is the first venture capital firm focused on biodiversity, aiming to serve as the conservationist on the cap table for nature-friendly startups. Now, the firm has closed its first fund, securing $25.9 million in capital commitments from Cisco Foundation, AMB Holdings, and Builders Vision, among others, along […]...

item.title: CMF Watch 3 Pro : la récente montre de Nothing est déjà à -42 % grâce aux soldes d’hiver
item.description: Dévoilée l'an dernier, la CMF Watch 3 Pro est une montre connectée peu chère, bourrée de fonctionnalités et intégrant même ChatGPT. Pendant les soldes, AliExpress l'affiche à 58,92 euros au lieu de 99 euros.

item.title: Brazil orders Meta to suspend policy banning third-party AI chatbots from WhatsApp
item.description: Brazil's competition watchdog has ordered WhatsApp to put on hold its policy that bars third-party AI companies from using its business API to offer chatbots on the app. The agency has also started an investigation against the company to determine if the policy is anti-competitive.

item.title: The new Sims 4 x Coach collab is the probably only way you'll get free designer handbags
item.description: A collection of free clothes just dropped in The Sims 4 as part of the game's latest collab.

item.title: « T’es mort ? » | Une application chinoise pour personnes seules fait réagir
item.description: « T’es mort ? » : cette nouvelle application au nom provocateur, qui permet d’envoyer des alertes si son utilisateur ne se signale pas régulièrement, cartonne en Chine, où les personnes vivant en solo sont de plus en plus nombreuses.

item.title: The Morning After: Apple will use Gemini to power Siri AI
item.description: Apple and Google have confirmed that Gemini’s models power the new version of Siri and other generative AI features. CNBC broke the news, but Apple and Google soon followed up with a lengthy joint statement. Here’s part of it: “Apple determined that Google’s Al technology provides the most capable foundation for Apple Foundation Models… Apple Intelligence will continue to run on Apple devices and Private Cloud Compute, while maintaining Apple’s industry-leading privacy standards.” In June, it was reported that Apple was considering partnerships with OpenAI and Anthropic for Siri (the voice ass...

item.title: Amazon is pushing Alexa+ upgrades on Prime members – and users aren't happy about it
item.description: If you're an Amazon Prime member in the US, you might find you're getting an automatic upgrade to Alexa+.

item.title: Samsung s’attaque au marché de l’occasion avec le « Reconditionné Premium » pour payer son smartphone moins cher
item.description: Samsung officialise l'arrivée de son programme « Reconditionné Premium » en France. Promettant des appareils remis à neuf avec des pièces d'origine et une garantie constructeur, le géant coréen entend bien faire de l'ombre aux reconditionneurs tiers.

item.title: Peter Capaldi Thinks ‘Doctor Who’ Has to Become Less Important to Survive
item.description: The Twelfth Doctor himself has some thoughts about where 'Doctor Who' has gone wrong recently.

item.title: Board Review: Tabletop Video Games With Physical Pieces
item.description: I loved Board’s unique blend of tabletop gaming, but my family gave it mixed reviews.

item.title: From Airbnb to the White House: Joe Gebbia is reshaping the government in Trump’s image
item.description: Trump decimated the U.S. government’s digital design agencies and replaced them with a personal propaganda czar. During President Donald Trump’s first administration, he left hundreds of government designers, across half a dozen or more agencies, to do their jobs.

item.title: The limited-edition Star Wars Outlaws is down to its lowest-ever price at Amazon
item.description: Score 60% off Amazon's exclusive 'Star Wars Outlaws — Limited Edition', with $40 off its PS5 price.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel spends 2 minutes breaking down exactly how much the world hates America
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel has given a damning breakdown of how he believes the world currently views America.

item.title: Elon Musk implores you not to buy a Tesla Roadster if safety is important to you
item.description: Elon Musk warns customers not to buy a Roadster if safety is important in most recent podcast appearance.

item.title: The Apple Mac mini is back under $500 at Amazon — act fast to save over $90
item.description: As of Jan. 13, the Apple 2024 Mac mini is on sale for $499.99 at Amazon, 17% off its list price of $599.

item.title: « L’optimisation est risquée » : dans ce jeu, vos FPS sont votre barre de vie
item.description: Et si optimiser les performances d'un jeu avait un autre avantage que la fluidité ? FPS Quest promet d'indexer votre barre de vie avec votre fréquence d'images par seconde. Enfin, pas tout à fait.

item.title: Galaxy A07 5G : le moins cher des Samsung sera mis à jour jusqu’en 2032
item.description: Samsung promet désormais six ans de mises à jour pour son nouveau modèle 5G le moins cher : le Galaxy A07 5G.

item.title: Boulanger solde un pack Philips Hue qui a tout ce qu’il faut pour sécuriser et illimuner votre domicile
item.description: Boulanger propose un kit Philips Hue très complet : avec une caméra de surveillance, deux ampoules et des détecteurs d’ouverture de portes, ce pack est utile pour sécuriser votre maison, tout en ajoutant une petite ambiance. Bonne nouvelle : il passe de 199,99 euros à 139,99 euros grâce à cette offre des soldes.

item.title: The Samsung Odyssey G5 gaming monitor is almost half price — now only $249.99
item.description: The Samsung Odyssey gaming monitor is now only $249.99, both for the 32-inch and 27-inch models.

item.title: Arnaque à la carte Vitale en cours : méfiez-vous des mails de l’Assurance Maladie, c’est peut-être une redoutable attaque phishing
item.description: Une nouvelle arnaque à la carte Vitale se propage en France. Des pirates diffusent actuellement une série de mails de phishing qui prétendent provenir de l'Assurance maladie. Profitant des récentes fuites de données de santé, les cybercriminels tentent de pirater les coordonnées bancaires des Français.

item.title: Moon phase today: What the Moon will look like on January 13
item.description: See the Moon phase expected for January 13, 2025 as well as when the next Full Moon is expected.

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for January 13, 2026
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1668 on January 13 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for January 13, 2026
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for January 13, 2026
item.description: The NYT Strands hints and answers you need to make the most of your puzzling experience.

item.title: Can the Garmin Forerunner 55 replace a personal coach for half-marathon prep?
item.description: Can the Garmin Forerunner 55 help you train for a half-marathon? Can it replace a personal coach?

item.title: Spanish energy giant Endesa says it was hit by data breach, customers affected and 20 million files allegedly put up for sale
item.description: A large database is being offered on the dark web.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Wants Silicon Valley to ‘Stand Up’ Against the Trump Administration
item.description: The LinkedIn cofounder and frequent Trump target has a simple message for his peers: “Just speak up about the things that you think are true.”

item.title: Atonemo Streamplayer Review: Make Old Speakers New Again
item.description: Can this discrete audio puck really drag any old speakers into the streaming age?

item.title: Converge Bio raises $25M, backed by Bessemer and execs from Meta, OpenAI, Wiz
item.description: AI drug discovery startup Converge Bio raised $25 million in a Series A led by Bessemer Venture Partners, with additional backing from executives at Meta, OpenAI, and Wiz.

item.title: 'Small decisions have long tails' – I asked ChatGPT for my horoscope, and what it told me was surprisingly grounding
item.description: ChatGPT's horoscope led to a surprisingly grounded reflection on the future

item.title: Hulu has dropped Tell Me Lies season 3 episode 3 a week early — and its shock cliffhanger could be the show's most brutal ending ever
item.description: Surprise! Tell Me Lies season 3 episode 3 is streaming on Hulu a week earlier than expected – and we're now left on the most jaw-dropping cliffhanger in the show's history.

item.title: Voiture électrique à 100 euros : comment Renault a tout raflé en 2025
item.description: Lancé fin septembre 2025, le leasing social vient de s'achever avec 50 000 voitures électriques disponibles à partir de 100 euros par mois. L'occasion de faire un bilan, et de s'apercevoir que la R5 (et Renault en général) sont les grands gagnants du dispositif.

item.title: Call of Duty might just be about to drop on Nintendo Switch 2 according to a new leak
item.description: A recent leak suggests that the Call of Duty series is set to arrive on Nintendo Switch 2 in the near future.

item.title: Jon Stewart summarises the current state of the world in 20 minutes
item.description: Jon Stewart has summarised recent events, from ICE's shooting of Renee Good to Trump's stance on Greenland and Venezuela, in his latest "Daily Show" monologue.

item.title: A modern head-fi great is bringing out planar magnetic headphones with huge drivers and an even bigger frequency range — and yet the headband might be the coolest part
item.description: Moondrop's new planar magnetic headphones feature 100mm drivers and a 3D-printed headband

item.title: Trump Declared a Space Race With China. The US Is Losing
item.description: If you want to put people back on the moon, don’t gut the agency in charge of getting them there.

item.title: Proton's Lumo AI chatbot now has an encrypted space for your projects
item.description: Proton’s latest update for Lumo, its privacy-focused chatbot, introduces a feature called Projects. It’s a dedicated and encrypted space for tasks that you know you’ll access again and again over an extended period of time, such as papers you’ll have to work on the whole semester or plans for a big trip you’re taking later this year. Lumo will remember and keep all the information and all the files you upload for every project you create. Any document you upload or resources you add to the chat will sync across devices, so you don’t have to repeat yourself every time you access a task. Project...

item.title: This skyline-stealing mural also powers its building
item.description: A residential tower in Edmonton, Alberta, uses colorful solar panels to turn a mural into a power source. At first glance, the most striking part of the SunRise, a recently redeveloped residential tower in Edmonton, Alberta, is the boldly colored facade, with strips of primary color and a lively mural. Called The Land We Share, the vibrant landscape sketch has sparkled on the skyline since its unveiling this past summer....

item.title: Nintendo president says the increasing cost of RAM is 'something we must monitor closely', but says there is no 'immediate impact on earnings' where the Switch 2 is concerned
item.description: Nintendo president Shuntaro Furukawa says the company is monitoring the increase in RAM pricing and memory shortage within the industry, but wouldn't comment on whether the issue could affect the Switch 2 price tag.

item.title: Xiaomi multiplie les deals avec l’arrivée de la 2e démarque des soldes
item.description: Pour cette première semaine des soldes Xiaomi commence fort en proposant même son nouveau Poco M8 en promo. Demain démarre la 2ᵉ démarque, mais on trouve déjà de très bonnes affaires sur ses smartphones, tablettes et téléviseurs... Découvrez les meilleures offres.

item.title: Prix des PC portables : l’astuce radicale de HP pour limiter la hausse des prix, mais pas pour tout le monde
item.description: Alors que HP réfléchirait à intégrer de la mémoire DRAM chinoise à certains de ses PC portables, la Chine se place en véritable alternative pour compenser la crise que traverse le marché cette année.
